title: Hour 2: The Calendar Jumper
description:
We recap our Halloween nights including Greg Cote and Mike Ryan's dad making their grandchildren's Halloween's all about them. Greg and Amin discuss "The Calendar Jumper" phenomenon. Jim Harbaugh wants to press charges against Michigan State players. Plus, Stugotz is upset no one is talking about the World Series, Billy shares the Useless Sound Montage, and Witty may have to do the show from a bathtub.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
